actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wilderness Act for the purpose of removing wilderness areas from all forms of appropriation and disposition under mining and mineral leasing laws.

summary.text: Removes wilderness areas under the Wilderness Act from all forms of appropriation and disposition under mining and mineral leasing laws. (Amends 16 U.S.C. 1133(d)(3))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wilderness Act for the purpose of removing wilderness areas from all forms of appropriation and disposition under mining and mineral leasing laws.
